general.name: segueTargetPlate
general.description: The SEGUE targeting information for all fibers associated with a given plate. The format is the same as the full target files .

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

MATCH.name: MATCH
MATCH.description:
Number of objects in USNO-B which matched
this object within a 1 arcsec radius. If negative, then the nearest
matching USNO-B object itself matched more than 1 SDSS object.
MATCH.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

DELTA.name: DELTA
DELTA.description:
Distance between this object and the
nearest matching USNO-B object (arcsec)
DELTA.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

SCOLOR.name: SCOLOR
SCOLOR.description: -0.249*uMag+0.794*gMag-0.555*rMag+0.234+0.011*p1s-0.010 (Helmi et al. 2003) used in SEGUE-1 target selection, unused in SEGUE-2 (mag)
SCOLOR.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

P1S.name: P1S
P1S.description: 0.91*umg+0.415*umg-1.280 (Helmi et al. 2003) used in SEGUE-1 target selection, unused in SEGUE-2 (mag)
P1S.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

TOTALPM.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

HG.name: HG
HG.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

MI.name: MI
MI.description: 4.471+7.907*imz-0.837*imz*imz used in SEGUE-1 target selection, unused in SEGUE-2 (mag)
MI.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

DISTI.name: DISTI
DISTI.description: 10^((iMag-Mi+5)/5.0) used in SEGUE-1 target selection, unused in SEGUE-2 (mag)
DISTI.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

DISTV_KPC.name: DISTV_KPC
DISTV_KPC.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

VTRANS_GALREST.name: VTRANS_GALREST
VTRANS_GALREST.description: transvere velocity, km/s, derived from TOTALPM and DISTV_KPC, in a frame at rest w.r.t the Galaxy  (km)
VTRANS_GALREST.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

MUTRANS_GALRADREST.name: MUTRANS_GALRADREST
MUTRANS_GALRADREST.description: derived PM (mas/year) perpendicular to the Galactocentric radial vector, assuming all motion is along a Galactocentric radial vector, in a frame at rest w.r.t the Galaxy  (mas)
MUTRANS_GALRADREST.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

MURAD_GALRADREST.name: MURAD_GALRADREST
MURAD_GALRADREST.description: derived PM (mas/year) along the Galactocentric radial vector, assuming all motion is along a Galactocentric radial vector, in a frame at rest w.r.t the Galaxy  (mas)
MURAD_GALRADREST.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

VTOT_GALRADREST.name: VTOT_GALRADREST
VTOT_GALRADREST.description: total velocioty, km/s, derived from TOTALPM and DISTV_KPC, in a frame at rest w.r.t the Galaxy  (km)
VTOT_GALRADREST.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

MG_TOHV.name: MG_TOHV
MG_TOHV.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

VTRANS_TOHV.name: VTRANS_TOHV
VTRANS_TOHV.description: transverse velocity in Galactocentric coords, using the distance estimate from MG_TOHV which is appropriate for old stars near the MSTO and corrected for peculiar solar motion 16.6 km/s toward RA,Dec 267.5,28.1   (km)
VTRANS_TOHV.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

PM1SIGMA_TOHV.name: PM1SIGMA_TOHV
PM1SIGMA_TOHV.description: Estimate of the 1-sigma error in total proper motion at this r magnitude.  Formula is sqrt(4.56*4.56 + frate*2.30*2.30), where frate is 10^(0.4*(rMag-19.5)).  The constants come from the Munn et al. 2004 (AJ, 127, 3034) paper describing the recalibration of USNOB with SDSS.  (mas)
PM1SIGMA_TOHV.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

V1SIGMAERR_TOHV.name: V1SIGMAERR_TOHV
V1SIGMAERR_TOHV.description: The corresponding 1-sigma error in the transverse velocity based on PM1SIGMA_TOHV and the the distance estimate using MG_TOHV  (km)
V1SIGMAERR_TOHV.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

SEGUE2_TARGET2.name: SEGUE2_TARGET2
SEGUE2_TARGET2.description: bitmask that records the category or categories of "standards" for the pipeline, special calibration targets like Stetson standards or globular cluster stars, for which this object passed the selection criteria
SEGUE2_TARGET2.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update
